Module CAViewer
Package sample.controller

Class NeighbourhoodSelector

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
sample.controller.NeighbourhoodSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class NeighbourhoodSelector
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
A widget that selects the neighbourhood and weights for a rule.

Example Usage: 
 NeighbourhoodSelector selector = new NeighbourhoodSelector(2);

 Button button = new Button("Load Neighbourhood");
 button.setOnAction(() -> {
     System.out.println(selector.getNeighbourhoodAndWeights());
 });

      public org.javatuples.Pair<Coordinate[],​int[]> getNeighbourhoodAndWeights()
      Gets the selected neighbourhood and weights.
      Returns:
      Returns a pair. The 1st entry is the neighbourhood and the 2nd are the weights.
